art.author: yvette_smith
art.post: I myself have just finished the book “Heaven is for Real” and I loved it. I have been talking about it all week. I’m excited to share it with friends and family. My Faith is strengthning. Thank u Jesus for loving us I give u praise. We love u Father God..
art.title: More on Akiane’s Jesus, Heaven is for Real and the Man in the Shroud
